name: Ids
description: The Ids library provides utilities for generating unique identifiers with various character patterns. It ensures uniqueness by checking against existing tables and supports custom patterns and lengths.

sharedFunctions.name: CreateUniqueId
sharedFunctions.description: Generates a unique identifier with customizable length and character pattern. Checks against a table to ensure uniqueness.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: Table to check for existing IDs (uses keys for uniqueness check)

parameters.name: len
parameters.description: Length of the ID to generate (default: 8)

parameters.name: pattern
parameters.description: Custom character pattern to use (default: uppercase letters and numbers)

sharedFunctions.example:
local existingIds = { ABC123 = true, DEF456 = true }
local newId = Ids.CreateUniqueId(existingIds, 6)
print("Generated unique ID: " .. newId)

-- Custom pattern (only vowels)
local vowelId = Ids.CreateUniqueId({}, 4, "AEIOU")
print("Vowel ID: " .. vowelId)

sharedFunctions.name: RandomUpper
sharedFunctions.description: Generates a unique identifier using only uppercase letters.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: Table to check for existing IDs

parameters.name: len
parameters.description: Length of the ID to generate

sharedFunctions.name: RandomLower
sharedFunctions.description: Generates a unique identifier using only lowercase letters.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: Table to check for existing IDs

parameters.name: len
parameters.description: Length of the ID to generate

sharedFunctions.name: RandomString
sharedFunctions.description: Generates a unique identifier using both uppercase and lowercase letters.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: Table to check for existing IDs

parameters.name: len
parameters.description: Length of the ID to generate

sharedFunctions.name: RandomNumber
sharedFunctions.description: Generates a unique identifier using only numeric characters.

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: Table to check for existing IDs

parameters.name: len
parameters.description: Length of the ID to generate

sharedFunctions.name: Random
sharedFunctions.description: Generates a unique identifier using the default pattern (uppercase letters and numbers).

parameters.name: tbl
parameters.description: Table to check for existing IDs

parameters.name: len
parameters.description: Length of the ID to generate
